name: Untitled Platformer Project
description:
This is an early build of a project I've been working on for a while, so there will still be bugs. I've decided to upload it how it is now due to having spent at least 9 months for this to be the current result, and if I want to add more features and improve already existing ones I might have to rebuild the whole thing from mostly scratch. So I'm uploading it how it is now in hopes of recieving feedback so that I can improve both the game and my own skills further. Currently there is no sound at all.

Controls:

W - Jumping

A/D - Movement

S - Crouching

Arrow Keys - Move the shield

E - Shield Throw
